knimeNode.name: LoG Spot Detection (TrackMate)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Laplacian of Gaussian (LoG) on the input images and returns an image of type BitType containing the found spots.

fullDescription.intro:
Implementation heavily based on the TrackMate (see http://fiji.sc/TrackMate) LogDetector.
Applies a Laplacian of Gaussian on the input images and returns an image of type BitType containing the found spots. To achieve the full functionality of the TrackMate SpotDetector you may want to use an Connected Component Analysis to create a Labeling and filter the detected spots by various features (Image Segment Feature Node) afterwards. We refer to our examples on the web-page (Example: Tracking with Trackmate).
